Enter your email Enter your Passwod Greetings from the Rolling Meadows Library! I am your resident librarian and bibliophile. Watch this space for news related to reading in general as well as things specific to our Rolling Meadows library.


 Soon, you will receive a survey from me. If you are at all interested, please fill it out and return it to the tray at the front desk.


 You may have noticed a few changes recently. The nonfiction books have been re-tagged NF instead of Biography and History. This is because I plan to add some nonfiction books that do not fit either of these categories. Also, all books have been color-coded to make.
Hello blank fragment
